rukus.text: O vos believe let Me inform vos de trade save vos painful retribution
Believe in DEUS His messenger strive causa DEUS tuus moneta tuus vita! Hoc est bonus deal vos si vos unus knew
In return He forgives tuus sins admits vos gardens flowing streams beautiful mansions gardens Eden! Hoc est major triumph
Additionally vos get something vos enim love support ex DEUS guaranteed victory. Dedit bonus news believers

O vos believe est deus supporters disciples Jesus filius Mary. When he dictus to them Qui est my supporters DEUS they dictus Nos est deus supporters. Ergo group Infans Israel believed alias group disbelieved Nos helped those believed contra their enemy they won
